alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 2:10AM CST until January 06 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 29 below zero. * WHERE...Perkins, Lincoln, Keith and Deuel Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ this morning to 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
